You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &aogon;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Aogon;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0104/index.htm U+00104].
  * `&aogon;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0105/index.htm U+00105].
